definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: sprinkle; Aram. [[נְדָא]], [[אַדֵּי]] Le 4:6 and oft., for [[הִזׇּה]] Syr. ndo0 is erupit, stillavit Is 63:3, alsoprominutt, etc. PS:2291);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[יִזֶּה]] Le 6:20, Le 6:20, [[וְיֵז]] Is 63:3 (but rd. [[וַיֵּז]] Che Di Du Ges:§ 53, p. N., 107 bN. al.), [[וַיִּז]] 2Ki 9:33; —spurt, spatter, alw. of blood:—[[וַיִּז מִדָּמָהּ אֶל־]] 2Ki 9:33 and some of her blood spurted against the wall; so [[ויז נִחְחָם]] Is 63:3 (c.—[[עַל־]] rei, in metaph.); [[יִזֶּה מִדָּמָה]] Le 6:20, cf. v:Le 6:20 (both c. [[עַל־]] rei).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[וְהִזׇּת]] consec. Le 4:6 + 12 t.; 2 ms. [[וְהִזֵּיתָ֫]] Ex 29:21; Impf. [[יַזֶּה]] Le 16:14 (Is 52:15 v. infr.); [[וַיַּז]] Le 8:11, Le 8:30; Imv. [[הַזֵּה]] Nu 8:7; Pt. cstr. [[מַזֵּה]] Nu 19:21; —cause to spurt, sprinkle upon, in ceremonials of P: c. acc. + [[עַל־]] pers. Nu 8:7 (water), + [[עַל־]] rei, [[לִפְנֵי]] Le 16:15; obj. oft. [[מִן]] partit., or implied in context; sq. [[עַל־]] Le 5:9, Le 14:7, Le 16:14, Le 16:19 (all of blood); Le 8:11 (oil); Nu 19:18, Nu 19:19 (water), Ex 29:21, Le 8:30 (both blood and oil); sq. [[אֶל־]] Le 14:51 (blood and water), [[אֶל־נׁכַח פְּנֵי]] Nu 19:4 (blood); sq. [[לִפְנֵי]] Le 4:6, Le 4:17, Le 16:14 (blood), Le 14:16, Le 14:27 (oil); once without prep. [[מַזֵּה]] Nu 19:21 the sprinkler of the water.—Is 52:15 v. II. [[נזה]].
